commitments.in_scope: Stay in bed until wake up time.
commitments.task_intent: Get rest and prepare for the day.

commitments: completing morning routine and breakfast at home

commitments.task_intent: Finish personal morning routine and have a quick breakfast before leaving for Hobbs Cafe

commitments.task_intent: Get the cafe ready for 8am opening by starting coffee service setup, turning on equipment, and placing Valentine’s décor.

commitments.in_scope: Travel home from pub, review tomorrow's schedule, set reminders, prepare belongings for tomorrow, and complete a light bedtime routine (wash face, brush teeth) before bed.
